rows.label: tlk70000026_02_msg0001
rows.name:
I thought I'd heard a scream and then
all of a sudden there were monsters
everywhere!

rows.label: tlk70000026_02_msg0002
rows.name:
All I could think of was that I had to
protect the glass in the workshop!

rows.label: tlk70000026_02_msg0003
rows.name:
In the end, quite a lot of pieces got
broken, but at least I managed to
protect the furnace and cooling unit.

rows.label: tlk70000026_02_msg0004
rows.name:
Once my instructor gets back, we'll be
pretty much up and running as normal,
I think.

rows.label: tlk70000026_02_msg0005
rows.name: Until then, I'll be holding the fort!
